name: Chronicles of Nanako
description:
Chronicles of Nanako is a mail order compilation on a double sided tape. It contains two games by the Spanish development group The Mojon Twins. Both games were previously available for free, but are here bundled as fully remastered versions including enhanced gameplay and improved graphics. These new versions are only available through this release. The included games are:
  • Nanako Descends to Hell
  • Nanako in Classic Japanese Monster Castle
